00051 
00052         int rxnType;  // 0: equilibrium; 1:kinetics
00053         
00054         double mKeq;    // rxnType=0, equilibrium constant ALWAYS in LOG SPACE!
00055         double mkr;  // rxnType=1, reaction rate
